name: CastleTrivia
description:
CastleTrivia is a trivia game and a short horror story.

You are an adventurer trapped and dying inside a castle full of monsters. Your only chance to survive is to earn the trust of Qin-Qin, a fellow adventurer who has an encyclopedic understanding of vampires. 

Will your mastery of vampire myths save you?

Features
  • Only two significant endings possible
  • Ten random questions

When in doubt, feel free to google the answers. The questions are designed to be vague, silly, or difficult.

Browser Issues
  • Firefox users should be okay and playing in fullscreen mode is recommended. 
  • If your browser won't let you enter the castle, please download one of the available packages that will work for your OS.
Source Code

The source code is available for anyone interested in how I implemented the Multiple Choice feature. The button below will open a GitHub repository.
